sentences.en: Please taste with high-quality earphone or high-power audio.
sentences.cn: 请使用高品质耳机或大功率音响配合体验。

sentences.en: By e-mail and earphone, he confers with Jack Parrish, chief meteorologist, and they order the NOAA technician to slip a dropsonde into the shoot.
sentences.cn: 通过电子邮件和耳机，他与首席气象学家杰克·帕里什协商，他们命令国家海洋和大气管理局的技术人员将探空仪放入拍摄中。

sentences.en: The language of kabuki is difficult to understand, but earphones are provided to explain the story, and there are also earphone services available in English.
sentences.cn: 歌舞伎中使用的语言很难理解，但是会提供耳机来解释故事的内容，还有英文解说服务。
